author: Desiree Murphy
title: Prince Harry Spotted Shirtless on the Beach in Jamaica -- Check Out His Sizzling Hot Abs!
text: Prince Harry Spotted Shirtless on the Beach in Jamaica -- Check Out His Sizzling Hot Abs! by Desiree Murphy 3:20   FAMEFLYNET PICTURES Prince Harry may be off the market, but he's still the Prince of Fun ! The 32-year-old royal is currently vacationing in Jamaica with his girlfriend, Meghan Markle. Just one day after the two attended a wedding for one of Prince Harry's pals, he was spotted showing off his fit figure while relaxing on the beach with friends. Sporting some scruff, bright blue swim shorts, a baseball cap and sunnies, shirtless Prince Harry looked sizzling hot while soaking up the sun. Photo: FAMEFLYNET PICTURES And can we talk about those chiseled abs? Swoon! Photo: FAMEFLYNET PICTURES WATCH: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle Look Absolutely Adorable at Wedding in Jamaica While all eyes were on Prince Harry on Saturday, his girlfriend, chic in a navy-and-green floor-length gown, stole the show at the wedding reception. At one point, the Suits star even wrapped her arm around her beau's back, flashing a smile as the two sipped on champagne with another guest. Hear more on their romantic Caribbean getaway in the video below! RELATED SLIDESHOW
